website_summaries.verdict: This camera backpack is as stylish and spacious as they come. The large design comes with a large price tag.
pros: Sophisticated and trendy, the look of this bag is awesome
It's very big, but well secured
It's no problem to easily fit your camera, accessories, and additional devices
cons: It's pricey, and the size of the bag is too big for smaller users
The shoulder straps may be a bit uncomfortable for some to wear

customer_reviews.title: Bag is great, but is a bit bigger for a smaller female!
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: This bag was a little bit big for my back for a small (110 lb) female. I loved the design though. It was super well made and very durable. Fit all of my gear inside with no problem. I was upset I had to return it and it didn't work out, but the company was amazing and sent me a different bag, free of charge! A much smaller model, which I love. Thank you BagSmart! Original Review: Bag itself is great, but it was very large for a smaller female videographer. I was looking for a smaller sized bag. It is a massive backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Elise Sowa

customer_reviews.title: Well made but design needs improvement for easier usage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bag. It stands up when set on ground. It has nice storage. What I would change about it, is to have access to my cameras on the front side. To access the back side where the cameras are stored is awkward. The straps are in the way. Included inside is a smaller portable bag which is nice. It's too bad the smaller bag isn't big enough to carry a fully assembled camera. Also a strap on the smaller bag to hang over your shoulder would make it ideal. This backpack is my personal item while travelling which is great but it's too bulky to lug around while shooting on assignment.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall, but they poor quality materials
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great option if you’re going to be using it everyday, it’s pretty comfortable. It’s kind of big, but I don’t mind it since it leaves me more room for gear! However the biggest downfall of this bag is the poor quality of the materials ☹️ I went to open the flap on the inside of the bag, and it tore while I was barely pulling on the zippers. I’m pretty bummed about this considering it’s a $100+ backpack, and I probably can’t get a replacement, I definitely expected better quality materials, but everything else is pretty good and I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for 600mm lenses and lots of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Took it as a carry on personal item and carried my 600mm lens, compatible tripod, camera and additional lenses. It is stylish for a male or female (my husband and I trade who carries the bag). We do some pretty strenuous hikes with this and it is perfect for it. It looks new even after being set on rocks etc. As well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this bag! It is a little big on my 5'5" frame, but hasn't bothered me yet! I carry two D750 bodies - 85mm and 35mm attached, a 50mm, and an old D3100 with a 35 attached. I love the extra bag! I use it to store all my extra batteries, and chargers. The mesh covering on the inside did rip on me, but that more my fault for trying to zip it up in the manner in which I was zipping. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Orsi

customer_reviews.title: Fictional and fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: First I liked the mesh zipped protector on the inside, second I liked the fact it opens from the rear making it more secure, I also like the bag that’s included in the backpack for all those loose cables and it’s very sturdy. Comfortable sturdy back pack fit for purpose
customer_reviews.author: Tim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this bag. Although it is a pretty big backpack the space inside is not all that. It was not really designed that well. You can't really fit anything extra except for your camera, some lenses, and your laptop. It become extremely heavy to carry with just that amount of stuff as well. The straps on the outside are also absolutely awful. It takes extreme effort to get the leather strap into the leather hole. This was very poorly constructed, the holes are much smaller than they should be for the straps. I will certainly be sending this product back.
customer_reviews.author: H&G Express INC

customer_reviews.title: This will hold all your stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my adult daughter, who has a digital SLR with numerous large lenses, as well as a digital video camera with monitor. She is able to fit all her equipment into this bag, which protects the items from damage. In addition, the bag accommodates her laptop along with numerous smaller items, and even holds her Hydro Flask water bottle. She is delighted with her new bag, therefore I am as well. We have found no negative aspects to this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding together very well!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this backpack for a few months now and it’s everything I need and more! I might use it as a diaper bag someday too haha! Love quality and the color combination. Pretty much goes with every outfit too! I can fit all of my camera gear in it ( two full frame cameras, 3 lens, flash, lens hoods, remote, batteries, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Alliyah

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke with in hours.
customer_reviews.text: Update: They offered to send me a new bag and fixed the issues. I haven’t had any problems with it since and it’s exactly what I was looking for. It did have a smell, but it went away after about a month. The zipper broke the first time I used the bag. I wish this bag was better quality because I really like the design. The front leather straps, as other reviews state are very difficult to use. The bag was able to fit what I needed ( 2-mark iii, 17-40, 35mm, 50mm, 135, 3 speedlights +) but is useless with such a poor quality zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Golightly

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The BAGSMART Camera Backpack is spacious and holds my Panasonic Lumix G85 with a Rokinon Cine-DS 85mm lens attached, as well as my 12-60mm, 40-150mm, and 25mm lenses. It even has room for my Rode VideoMic and my Panasonic Lumix FZ300 camera. It also features a padded compartment for a 15" laptop, so my MacBook Pro fits in perfectly. It has a padded back for comfort, and extra storage on top, front, and sides. The bag is a bit heavy when loaded, but that's not the bag's fault. :)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Presley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for traveling
customer_reviews.text: The inner liner that covers your gear didn't last me very long. It ripped. But I still love this bag. At first I thought it was weird that I had to open it from the back side of the bag but now after months using it and traveling with it. I love it! Being able to open it from the back makes it so no one can easily steal from you. Traveling on a plane with this bag makes the perfect carry-on. I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Bowen

customer_reviews.title: The Amount of space it provide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my boyfriend for father's day. It was the best investment. It is able to fit all 3 of his cameras plus his 2 flashes and etc. Very durable and the space is amazing. Love the different organized compartments. Would definitely recommend this to any photographer who are trying to give up the multiple camera bags, this is great!!
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall great bag. It can fit all of my gear safely and is fairly sleek and stylish compared to most. Only complaint is the material attracta hair and lint. I'm constantly having to run a lint brush on it before shoots and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bag, however, I bought it to use as a "personal item" (carry-on) and the airline limitation for this item (not the larger carry-on, but in place of a purse) is 17"high x 13"wide. This item is a full 19" high and therefore not as stated. Since it has a firm structure, this bag could not be crushed down into a smaller size. Otherwise, bag seems beautifully constructed, and very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: suh

customer_reviews.title: I'm really picky about camera bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag a couple of months ago and it really has served me well. For the price point, I wanted to make sure I was getting something of quality and I'm happy to say I did. The bag keeps a good amount of gear safe all while looking very discreet and stylish. The only thing that would make the bag perfect if there were more pockets on the inside. Otherwise, this bag is such a good purchase. IG@ Warmtortillias
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: MIDDLE INSIDE RIPPED AFTER 3 WEEKS
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack compared to my last one. It holds my camera, a few lenses, my audio equipment, my drone and even my tripod. THE REASON I VOTE 3 STARS - the middle layer of the backpack (Clear zip thingy) broke within the first 3 weeks of carrying pack. It is quite a spare me moment and I would not have bought if I knew this would happen.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Christian

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it much but it seems like a very reliable bag. I like all the compartments. I like that the inside is able to be moved to the size nessecary for what you want in it. I love that the zipper to access the main compartment is against your back. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Not so strong as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good bag, but after four months of using it brakes (look at the photo). I'm still using it with one strap because I don't know how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Andriy K.

customer_reviews.title: Just absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this bag and it blew my mind how amazing it is! I set my expectations high and it surpassed my them! I recommend this bag highly to any photographer its prefect in everyway!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and functionality ! Very pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Worry free transporting.
customer_reviews.text: Traveling around taking photos, hands are usually full. A strapped bag is unstable where the backpack style is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O'Malia

customer_reviews.title: Fits under airplane seat!
customer_reviews.text: I truly have been enjoying this backpack. It fits EVERYTHING I need for photo and video shoots
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Bag is way bigger than anticipated, I expected it to be smaller. Very roomy if you carry lots of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, the one thing I don't like is the comfort. It services its purpose but its not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William Riddick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product Highly recommend I managed to fit Two cameras and a drone box
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: This bag is as expected! Fits my camera equipment good!
customer_reviews.author: Carlie O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: the bag is nice quality, but could have been a better design
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE - The company returned the bag no problem and sent us a new bag, which has a much better design. Updating to 4 stars because of their customer service. I did like the color of the leather accents on the first bag better as they were lighter, the new bag’s are a dark brown. Initial review - I returned the bag because one of the leather straps didn’t fit into the loop. Otherwise, the bag is nice quality, but could have been a better design. Getting into the camera area, you need to take the bag off and unzip the back to actually get your camera out. Also, the leather straps in front would be much better as snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited about this bag as it looked simliar to ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag wasnt for me but returing it was easy so im giving a better review!
customer_reviews.author: Osa

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to hold everything!
customer_reviews.text: This is a NICE camera backpack. I’m a pro photographer who was looking for an upgraded camera backpack that would store more items. This one is super nice and even has an interior bag for all of my little things like chargers and batteries. There is a similar one on Amazon that had reviews saying it was smaller than pictured, so I paid the extra 20 bucks because this one looks slightly bigger. It is definitely large enough to hold my stuff! It’s extremely well-made and it actually looks better than the pictures. I am very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Support on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of gear, but an even stellar experience with the customer support. Loving the new design. The previous model was great as well. I lost a small magnetic latching device by accident, and reached out with the intention of seeing what they could do to help. They politely offered to mail me the new model for 100% free. Best customer support experience on amazon by far. Thanks for the new product.
customer_reviews.author: Klm

product_meta.title: BAGSMART Camera Backpack for SLR/DSLR Cameras & 15.6" Laptop with Waterproof Rain Cover & Tripod Mount, Black.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 12.59"L x 17.3"H x 6.3"W; Fully convertible from an everyday backpack into a DSLR camera travel bag by taking out the center compartment.

This professional backpack has two main compartments in the back so it's steal proof when walking, the upper one is for storing clothing, The lower compartment with removable customize padded divider set that allow you to hold one DSLRs with about 3-6 lenses.

The separate padded compartment for 15.6" laptops/notebooks, tablets, books and more. Side and Front Compartments for Easy & Quick Access to camera and accessories like battery, cable, lenscap or cellphone storage.
The heavily padded shoulder straps and wide, adjustable waist and chest straps make the backpack comfort on the go. The exterior also features a tripod holder.
Include a rain cover, concealed in the bottom zippered bag for unexpected weather. You can also use it as carry on while travelling.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
